description: I’ll admit, I had to read this story a couple of times, since it’s so unbelievable. title: Emory Univesity Suspends Students Over AI Study Tool The School Gave Them $10k To Build And Promoted

description: How much harm is done to children in the name of “protecting” them? Entirely too much. Since the release of Jonathan Haidt’s book, “The Anxious Generation,” a few months back, there has been plenty of […]
title: Why Jonathan Haidt’s ‘Protect The Kids’ Proposals Could Make Things Worse For Kids

description: Generally speaking, a private company’s press release is not “news.” If anyone wants to watch companies stroke themselves off in public, there are plenty of sites dedicated to that kink. title: OMFG Here Come The ‘News’ Outlets To Do ShotSpotter’s PR Heavy Lifting For It

title: Daily Deal: The Complete Cisco Training Bundle

description: While lawmakers, looking to get on cable TV, spent much of the last few years performatively hyperventilating about TikTok privacy and national security issues, few of those same folks seem quite as bothered by the parade of obvious, nasty vulnerabilities in the nation’s telecom networks. title: Major SS7 Vulnerability In Wireless Networks Oddly Gets A Fraction Of The Hysteria Reserved For TikTok

description: If Congress doesn’t get Google and Meta to agree to Section 230 reforms, it’s going to destroy the rest of the open internet, while Google and Meta will be just fine. If that sounds stupidly counterproductive, well, welcome to today’s Congress. As we were just discussing, the House Energy and Commerce committee is holding a […]
title: The Plan To Sunset Section 230 Is About A Rogue Congress Taking The Internet Hostage If It Doesn’t Get Its Way

description: Are you an NFL fan? If you are, are there particular teams or games you want to watch? title: NFL Inks Deal With Netflix To Stream A Handful Of Xmas Day Games Only
